posts.post_content:
$36.9k

Hard to find , obviously. Willing to meet w/in 50 miles of 28645 after small deposit.OTW will be mailed registered mail only, so may take some time getting there.   Payment is net to me. prefer cashiers check, but will take PP.  
email me for # if interested. icurnmedic at yahoo dot com. 
As always "I will take it " trumps negotiations. 
Thanks 
Thomas
